_meta.source: Researched from Brisbane Marketing, TripAdvisor, and local guides

bbox_hint.note: Covers Hamilton terminal, CBD, South Bank, and Lone Pine

label_overrides.lone-pine-koala: Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary (cuddle a koala!)

transit_routes.name: CityCat Ferry
transit_routes.note: Best way to see Brisbane River. Connects terminal to CBD and South Bank. Use go card.

transit_routes.name: Mirimar Cruise to Lone Pine
transit_routes.note: Scenic river cruise to koala sanctuary. Includes entry. Koala cuddle extra.

featured_experiences.name: Lone Pine Koala Sanctuary
featured_experiences.note: World's first and largest koala sanctuary. Queensland allows koala cuddling (Victoria doesn't).

featured_experiences.name: South Bank Exploration
featured_experiences.note: Free inner-city beach. CityCat stop right there. Great for families.

featured_experiences.name: Story Bridge Adventure Climb
featured_experiences.note: Like Sydney BridgeClimb but shorter queues and cheaper. Book ahead for sunset climb.
